actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
